name: Dont Wake Up!
description:
Don't Wake Up! Best played with headphones (Sound needed)

Dreaming about pink clouds and candy cotton? But what is that?! Work is calling, and you can already hear the alarm clocks? In Don't Wake up you want to delay the inevitable waking up and search for the alarm clocks that want to ring you out of your sleep. But what is that, is your dream slowly changing?! 

This is the after jam release of our Ludum Dare 50 entry. We improved the game in every aspect and fixed all known bugs. This version differs quite a bit from the game we created in 72h. The original version of "Don't Wake Up!" can be played here.

The game is the most fun to play downloaded on your computer and a controller, but it also works in your browser with a mouse and keyboard: 

 Controller: 
  • Walk with the left stick
  • Look with the right stick
  • Jump with A
  • Dash with B
Keyboard:
  • Walk with W, A, S, D
  • Look with Mouse
  • Jump with SPACE
  • Dash with SHIFT 
 Team: 
  •  AR @Swordmage
  • Dominik Giesriegl
  • Samir Rieke @Swipish
  • Benjamin Vehling @Bloham
 Special Thanks to: 
  •  Philipp Labner
